snippet.title: RetroDoge Alpha Trailer  - 2023 Play-To-Earn Crypto Gaming
snippet.description:
Check out our Alpha trailer! Join the "Share the Alpha" competition by sharing with your friends for a chance to win 200$, click here: https://gleam.io/X2x69/retrodoge-share-the-alpha-competition

RetroDoge is a story-driven, nostalgic arcade-styled, #playtoearn BSC #crypto game wherein you play as Doge on a quest to rescue his kidnapped master Elon from the villainous God of Scams intent on destroying all of crypto with the biggest scam in the world.

The #game is supported by a solid community of retro game enthusiasts and modern #gamers alike who utilize the #staking platform for long term holding. With #NFTs inbound and greater goals in mind, the team shoots for the moon, but will land in the #pixel stars!

VIsion:
To build a crypto #gaming ecosystem that personifies the values and sentiments of the games of old, fostering a feeling of joy and success in our gamers and #investors alike. Employing the power of creative game development to raise awareness of crypto scams by providing an escape where players can bring all scams to an end.

#cryptocurrency #crypto #binance #playtogether #gameplay
